name: @orochi-network/smart-contracts
description: Orochi smart contracts for on-chain verification

scripts.build: yarn run compile && hardhat typechain && yarn flatten
scripts.flatten: mkdir -p flatten/ && npx hardhat flatten ./contracts/orocle-v1/OrocleV1.sol > ./flatten/OrocleV1.sol && npx hardhat flatten ./contracts/orand-v2/OrandProviderV2.sol > ./flatten/OrandProviderV2.sol && npx hardhat flatten ./contracts/orosign/OrosignV1.sol > ./flatten/OrosignV1.sol && npx hardhat flatten ./contracts/orosign/OrosignMasterV1.sol > ./flatten/OrosignMasterV1.sol && npx hardhat flatten ./contracts/examples/DiceGame.sol > ./flatten/DiceGame.sol && npx hardhat flatten ./contracts/orand-v2/OrandECVRFV2.sol > ./flatten/OrandECVRFV2.sol

author: chiro@orochi.network
